title: Continued RNC 2020 Coverage & A Tribute to Trump's Unparalleled Greatness
itunes:title: Continued RNC 2020 Coverage & A Tribute to Trump's Unparalleled Greatness
description:
Mike Pence gives a slyly dishonest RNC speech, Trevor rolls out a biopic about President Trump's greatness, and Jaboukie Young-White talks to RNC delegate Michael Albrecht.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
